Package padsof

Class Application

  • java.lang.Object
    • padsof.Application

  • public class Application
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    David Cabornero and Alejandro Santorum This class manages the application of the system, where we are going to save all our registered users, their apartments and offers and the appropriate comments.

      • createApartment

        public void createApartment​(int pc,
                            java.lang.String address,
                            java.lang.String description,
                            RegisteredUser owner)
                     throws OfferException,
                            UserException
        This method creates and initializes a new Apartment and adds it to the array.
        Parameters:
        pc - Postal code of the apartment
        address - Address of the apartment
        description - Description of the apartment
        owner - Landlord who owns the apartment
        Throws:
        OfferException - invalid offer
        UserException - this user cannot register a property or its blocked

      • createOffer

        public void createOffer​(float price,
                        Apartment apartment,
                        RegisteredUser owner,
                        java.util.GregorianCalendar initialDate,
                        int nDays,
                        int nMonths,
                        int nYears)
                 throws UserException,
                        OfferException
        This method creates and initializes a long stay offer and adds it to the array of offers
        Parameters:
        price - Price of the offer
        apartment - Apartment of the offer
        owner - Landlord who creates the offer
        initialDate - First day that a renter can rent the apartment
        nDays - The minimum number of days of the contract (you also have to introduce months and years)
        nMonths - The minimum number of months of the contract (you also have to introduce days and years)
        nYears - The minimum number of years of the contract (you also have to introduce months and days)
        Throws:
        UserException - this user cannot create an offer or its blocked
        OfferException - invalid offer operation

      • createOffer

        public void createOffer​(float price,
                        Apartment apartment,
                        RegisteredUser owner,
                        java.util.GregorianCalendar initialDate,
                        java.util.GregorianCalendar finalDate)
                 throws OfferException,
                        UserException
        This method creates and initializes a short stay offer and adds it to the array of offers
        Parameters:
        price - The price of the offer
        apartment - The apartment that is going to be rented
        owner - The Landlord who is going to rent the apartment
        initialDate - Beginning of the range of dates of the stay
        finalDate - End of the range of dates of the stay
        Throws:
        OfferException - invalid offer operation
        UserException - this user cannot create an offer or its blocked

      • editOffer

        public void editOffer​(Offer off,
                      java.lang.Float price,
                      java.util.GregorianCalendar initialDate,
                      java.util.GregorianCalendar finalDate)
               throws OfferException
        This edits a short offer
        Parameters:
        off - Offer to be edited
        price - Offer price
        initialDate - the new initial date
        finalDate - the new final date
        Throws:
        OfferException - only pending offers can be edited

      • editOffer

        public void editOffer​(Offer off,
                      java.lang.Float price,
                      java.util.GregorianCalendar initialDate,
                      java.lang.Integer nDays,
                      java.lang.Integer nMonths,
                      java.lang.Integer nYears)
               throws OfferException
        This edits a long offer
        Parameters:
        off - Offer to be edited
        price - Offer price
        initialDate - the new initial date
        nDays - The minimum number of days of the contract (you also have to introduce months and years)
        nMonths - The minimum number of months of the contract (you also have to introduce days and years)
        nYears - The minimum number of years of the contract (you also have to introduce months and days)
        Throws:
        OfferException - only pending offers can be edited

      • bookOffer

        public void bookOffer​(Offer offer,
                      RegisteredUser booker)
               throws OfferException,
                      UserException
        This method is used when a renter wants to book an offer
        Parameters:
        offer - Offer to be booked
        booker - Renter who books the offer
        Throws:
        OfferException - invalid offer operation
        UserException - this user cannot book an offer or its blocked

      • rentOffer

        public void rentOffer​(Offer offer,
                      RegisteredUser renter)
               throws OfferException,
                      UserException,
                      es.uam.eps.padsof.telecard.OrderRejectedException
        This method is used when a renter wants to rent an offer
        Parameters:
        offer - Offer to be rented
        renter - Renter who rents the offer
        Throws:
        OfferException - invalid offer operation
        UserException - this user cannot rent or its blocked
        es.uam.eps.padsof.telecard.OrderRejectedException - internet connection lost or invalid credit card number

                          java.util.GregorianCalendar date,
                          java.lang.String text)
                   throws UserException,
                          OfferException
        This function adds a text comment in an offer.
        Parameters:
        offer - Offer to be commented
        user - User who is going to comment
        date - Date when the comment was released
        text - Text of the comment
        Throws:
        UserException - the user is blocked
        OfferException - invalid offer operation

      • addCommentary

        public void addCommentary​(Offer offer,
                          RegisteredUser user,
                          java.util.GregorianCalendar date,
                          int points)
                   throws UserException,
                          OfferException
        This function adds a numerical rating in an offer.
        Parameters:
        offer - Offer to be rated
        user - User who is going to rate
        date - Date when the comment was released
        points - Numerical punctuation (integer) of the rating
        Throws:
        UserException - the user is blocked
        OfferException - invalid offer operation

      • search

        public java.util.ArrayList<Offer> search​(java.util.ArrayList<Offer> offers,
                                         java.util.ArrayList<Filter> filters)
        Function that filters the given offers using the given filters
        Parameters:
        offers - Array of all the offers to be filtered
        filters - Array of all the filters to be used
        Returns:
